representation_information.name: Macromedia Flash FLA Project File Format
representation_information.description: Authoring format for Macromedia MX application software. FLA files typically include vector image data for use in animations, timelines to control animation playback, and audio; they may also include bitmapped video content. FLA files may include or reference ActionScripts.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
